channel.title: Posts on Will's Dev Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Will's Dev Journey

item.title: Vnote App
item.description: Vnote: A multi-language note for vocabularies Intention: To provide a medium for people to connect, explore and understand the world, with diverse words and languages. Features: Meet with friends all over world, and ask them to teach some vocabularies from their own languages Learn by text, audio and image to enhance the memory of vocabularies Share through beautiful image and video saved in Photo Library Download: Vnote - Multi-language Note

item.title: Privacy Policy of Vnote App
item.description: I, the author of the iOS application named “Vnote - Multi-language Note”, donâ€™t store your data, period.
